message: I slip past them and run full speed for the door at the end of the hall.
Bursting through, I find myself outside.
Before me stretches a wide, empty lot. A black van and car are parked there. Several black-clothed men stand nearby.
Three people climb out of the back of the car窶病 small figure sandwiched between two larger ones.
When I see the person in the middle, I shout:

name: 蒼葉
message: "Granny!"
Two men are holding her up by the arms, dragging her toward the van's open door.
The remaining men see me and charge.

name: ミズキ
message: "...Wait."

One of the black-clothed men stops them.<k>
I can't see his face beneath his hood.
The man who spoke steps away from the group and walks up to me.
Slowly, with both hands, he pulls back his hood.

When I see his face...
<?>
My heart stops.

name: ミズキ
message: "Didn't think you'd come sniffing around here. I shoulda known better. You always did like sticking your nose in other people's business."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mizuki... Why... Why are you..."
Mizuki watches me as I struggle to speak, an eerie smile on his lips.

name: ミズキ
message: "I was waiting for the guys I sent after you... but if you're here, I guess they got caught."
No...
The Mizuki I know would never look at me like that, with a sneer of utter contempt.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's wrong with you? What happened? We were worried when you guys disappeared like that."

name: ミズキ
message: "Oh, that's what's buggin' you? Listen, Aoba, this shit is amazing. Dry Juice has been reborn! As part of Morphine."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Morphine?"

name: ミズキ
message: "The one and only. Everyone was right; they are legends. Other Rib gangs got nothing on 'em. Shit, they're practically gods."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Are you serious?"

name: ミズキ
message: "Do I sound like I'm joking? Dry Juice will be unstoppable now."

name: ミズキ
message: "The other gangs'll be kissing our feet! Hahahahaha!"

Mizuki cackles, his mouth open wide.
I can't believe it. Is this the guy I've known for years?
The men around him don't even blink.

They all have those blank, doll-like eyes.<k>
Almost like someone's controlling them...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Snap out of it, man! You're talking crazy!"

name: ミズキ
message: "Huh? What're you talking about? You're the crazy one."

name: ミズキ
message: "I mean, you're the one who turned me down, all those times I asked you to join."

name: ミズキ
message: "What? Did you think Rib was just a big fucking joke?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Of course not!"

name: ミズキ
message: "Then why'd you never join? You knew how serious I was."

name: ミズキ
message: "It's not too late. The gang's stronger than ever. Join us, as a member of the new Dry Juice."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'd rather die."
I know how passionate Mizuki is about Rib. That's why I give such a forceful reply.
This isn't Mizuki.
He frowns for a moment when he hears my response, but that weird smile quickly returns.

name: ミズキ
message: "...Oh, I get it. You'd rather die, huh? Okay. If that's how it's gonna be..."

name: ミズキ
message: "You love your grandma, don't you?"
Mizuki grabs Granny by the arm and pulls her toward him, then presses something against her neck.

A knife.<K>
Sweat, cold and clammy, rolls down my back.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Stop it!"

name: ミズキ
message: "I'll stop when you join my gang."
Granny squeezes her eyes shut, like she's preparing herself for what might happen.
This only makes me more desperate.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let her go!"

name: ミズキ
message: "You really don't get it, do you? I said join us."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I said no."

name: ミズキ
message: "No?"
Anger flickers once more across his face.

name: ミズキ
message: "You think I'm bluffing? All bark, no bite? ...Fine. I'll show you some bite."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hold on..."

name: ミズキ
message: "I hope you're happy with your decision."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mizuki! Stop!"
Mizuki presses the tip of his knife to Granny's throat.
No...
Stop...
Granny...
Granny!!!
I charge without a second thought.
Reaching Mizuki, I grab his arm and look into his eyes.
And then―
The world twists around me.
I've felt this before...
That's right... in Rhyme. When Noiz forced me into that match.
...No. That wasn't the first time.
I felt this even before that.
A long, long time ago...
